title: scientology-thecompiler-v20080313.zip
description:
SORRY, HAD TO REBUILD: there was a significant amount of duplicate materials in there, removed 800MB of duplicated materials.

The Compiler's gift to mankind: a treasure trove of Scientology-related historical materials, including countless scans from as early as the 1930s (there is even a clip from 1929).

More materials was added to the Compiler's generous work. The result is a must-have for anybody researching Scientology seriously, and anybody who wants to have solid references to document many aspects of all things related Scientology.

This was sent to me on a DVD, had to cancel my first torrent after I realized there was a lot of duplicated materials in there. Now it's fine.

Also, versioning will allow to keep adding to the archive.

Message from the Compiler (keep in mind times have changed since then):

"This CD collection is humbly tendered as a gift to Mankind... for research purposes into the Church of Scientology. It is given freely, but I would ask some things in return:

"* The Compiler wishes to remain anonymous. Forget who sent this to you and destroy the envelope it came in.

[...]

"* Do not speak about this collection publicly.

"The Compiler"
